Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO LOCAL GOVERNMENTS

Title: Authorizes the discontinuance of certain parklands in the town of Amherst, county of Erie
Summary: Authorizes the discontinuance of certain parklands in the town of Amherst, county of Erie for lease to Bell Atlantic Mobile Systems, LLC d/b/a Verizon Wireless for the placement and operation of a wireless communications tower.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to authorizing the discontinuance of certain parklands in the town of Amherst, county of Erie
